entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
